article_title: Deductibles may double as OPERS avoids tax
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: Not yet eligible for Medicare, more than 70,000 retirees and family members who rely on Ohio’s largest pension fund for their health care might see their deductibles more than double in 2017. The Ohio Public Employees Retirement System warned that it might make those and other significant changes to dodge a looming federal tax on health-care benefits.
